creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Alexandra and Dennis Lenehan
description: large round boulder near center with light grey shading and foliage at center; dark bamboo sprigs rise up at center from light grey marks at center; three line inscription at R; large rectangular relief stamp LRC, smaller rectangular relief stamp LLC; mounted on off-white board
markings:
LRC rectangular relief; LLC, small rectangular relief

red seal; 海屋in the right side
title: Bamboo and Rocks
